keyword: how many calories in ritz crackers
title: How Many Calories in Ritz Crackers?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in ritz crackers per serving, with detailed nutrition facts including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Ritz Crackers?
assumptions: Standard serving of 5 original Ritz crackers (16 g), plain, no added toppings or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, freshness, and portion size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 Ritz crackers provides about 80 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 slice cheddar cheese per serving
Top with 1 tsp peanut butter per cracker

faqs.q: How many calories in one Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: About 16 kcal per single original Ritz cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: A serving of 5 has 10 g carbs, including 0.5 g fiber and 1 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are Ritz crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 crackers contain 135 mg sodium, about 6% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: Per 5 crackers: 4.5 g total fat, with 1 g saturated and 0 g trans fat.
Minimalâ€”only 1 g protein per serving of 5 crackers.
